attributes.action: Military Draft for out of control, anti social youths.
attributes.background: Family's all over the United Kingdom struggle with uncontrollable anti social and disobedient behaviour which has a direct link to increase crime. Teen can choose for military Draft or juvenile punishment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure exactly what types of behaviour you're concerned about. We're also not sure whether you want to introduce a form of military service as part of the criminal justice system or a broader system for younger people. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
